summary: In order to cash-in a life insurance policy, a failing business owner asks one of his employees, who has financial woes of his own, to aid him in disguising his suicide into a robbery-murder.
cast: Martha Scott|Jeffrey Lynn|Harry Morgan|Katherine Emery|Richard Gaines|Henry O'Neill|Walter Sande|Michael Chapin|Arlene Gray|Raymond Roe|Robert Bray|Wanda Cantlon|Charles Flynn|Dan Foster|Joel Friedkin|John Hamilton|Katherine Lytle|Al Murphy|James Nolan|Theodore Rand|Carl Sklover|Betty Underwood|Nancy Valentine|Bernice Young
